issue.title: amazon.co.uk
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

4.8

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed analytics or tracker

### Which browser(s) do you use?

other (specify in comment below)

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.amazon.co.uk/s?k=burberry&rh=n%3A1731357031

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter, EasyList

### Privacy

AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, EasyPrivacy, Legitimate URL Shortener, Fanboy's Anti-Facebook List, Fanboy's Anti-thirdparty Fonts

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

_No response_

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

||redirect.prod.experiment.routing.cloudfront.aws.a2z.com/x.png?timestamp= (looks to be a tracker)

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

issue.title: lestubes.com
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

N/A (using uBlock)

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed ads or ad leftovers

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://m.lestubes.com/recipe/carrot-fingerling-potato-and-pea-ragout

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, EasyList

### Privacy

AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, EasyPrivacy, Fanboy's Enhanced Tracking List, Fanboy's Anti-Facebook List

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

AdGuard Annoyances filter, AdGuard Cookie Notices filter, AdGuard Popups filter, AdGuard Mobile App Banners filter, AdGuard Other Annoyances filter, AdGuard Widgets filter, Fanboy's Annoyances, EasyList Cookie List

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

AdGuard French filter, AdGuard Japanese filter, EasyList Italy

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/4f4d44a0-a54a-4978-9415-f8981b480db8)

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
Here is a (ublock-style) blocking rule:
```
||www.520xingyun.com/images/188_120.gif$image
```
Yes, it's not the best filter, however there are no good css classes on the element to target. The `520xingyun.com` domain might be an ads domain, so perhaps just block the entire domain?

comment.body:
Already blocked in Hagezi. I recommend you to use DNS level blocking.

```
Blocked by: HaGeZi's Pro++ Blocklist
||520xingyun.com^
```

issue.title: viennalife.com.tr
issue.body:

Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/57j4kw6vf0o40ssgo00ocwkcgk8ssknc8emwa4zm8c.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Windows v7.19.0 (4853) System version: | Microsoft Windows NT 10.0.22631.0 Browser: | Firefox License type: | paid AdGuard driver: | WFP Tracking protection options: | Block WebRTC,
Block Java,
Strip URLs from tracking parameters,
Hide your search queries,
Send Do-Not-Track header,
Hide your Referrer from third-parties (viennalife.com.tr),
Hide your User-Agent,
Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests,
Protect against DPI,
Self-destructing third-party cookies (30),
Block trackers,
Disable Windows Telemetry,
Turn off Advertising ID DNS filtering: | server: `https://d.adguard-dns.com/dns-query/xxxxxxx`
filters: `AdGuard DNS Filter`, `User DNS filter (url: none)`, `oisd big (url: https://big.oisd.nl/)` Filters: | Ad Blocking:

Bypass Paywalls Clean filter (url: https://gitflic.ru/project/magnolia1234/bypass-paywalls-clean-filters/blob/raw?file=bpc-paywall-filter.txt) Browsing Security: | enabled Browsing Security statistics: | disabled Userscripts: | AdsBypasser (url: https://adsbypasser.github.io/releases/adsbypasser.full.es7.user.js)
AdGuard Extra (url: https://userscripts.adtidy.org/release/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js)

[https://duckduckgo.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fduckduckgo.com%2F) ### Issue configuration [Import](https://reports.adguard.com/settings/import.html?adblocking.enabled=true&browsing_security.enabled=true&browsing_security.statistics_enabled=false&custom_filters=User%2520filter%2520%28url%3A%2520none%29%2CHide%2520YouTube%2520Shorts%2520%28url%3A%2520https%3A%2F%2Fraw.githubusercontent.com%2Fgijsdev%2Fublock-hide-yt-shorts%2Fmaster%2Flist.txt%29%2CBypass%2520Paywalls%2520Clean%2520filter%2520%28url%3A%2520https%3A%2F%2Fgitflic.ru%2Fproject%2Fmagnolia1234%2Fbypass-paywalls-clean-filters%2Fblob%2Fraw%3Ffile%3Dbpc-paywall-filter.txt%29&dns.custom_bootstrap=&dns.custom_fallback=&dns.custom_filters=User%2520DNS%2520filter%2520%28url%3A%2520none%29%2Coisd%2520big%2520%28url%3A%2520https%3A%2F%2Fbig.oisd.nl%2F%29&dns.enabled=true&dns.fallback_mode=System&dns.filters=15&dns.servers=https%3A%2F%2Fd.adguard-dns.com%2Fdns-query%2Fxxxxxxx&dns.timeout=0&extensions=AdsBypasser%2520%28script%3B%2520url%3A%2520https%3A%2F%2Fadsbypasser.github.io%2Freleases%2Fadsbypasser.full.es7.user.js%29%2CAdGuard%2520Extra%2520%28script%3B%2520url%3A%2520https%3A%2F%2Fuserscripts.adtidy.org%2Frelease%2Fadguard-extra%2F1.0%2Fadguard-extra.user.js%29%2CAdGuard%2520Popup%2520Blocker%2520%28script%3B%2520url%3A%2520https%3A%2F%2Fuserscripts.adtidy.org%2Frelease%2Fpopup-blocker%2F2.5%2Fpopupblocker.user.js%29%2CBypass%2520All%2520Shortlinks%2520Debloated%2520%28script%3B%2520url%3A%2520https%3A%2F%2Fcodeberg.org%2FAmm0ni4%2Fbypass-all-shortlinks-debloated%2Fraw%2Fbranch%2Fmain%2FBypass_All_Shortlinks.user.js%29%2CBypass%2520Paywalls%2520Clean%2520-%2520en%2520%28script%3B%2520url%3A%2520https%3A%2F%2Fgitflic.ru%2Fproject%2Fmagnolia1234%2Fbypass-paywalls-clean-filters%2Fblob%2Fraw%3Ffile%3Duserscript%2Fbpc.en.user.js%29&extensions.enabled=true&filters=208.249.11.13.14.17.18.19.1.20.21.2.3.4.6&license_type=paid&product_type=Win&product_version=7.19.0+%284853%29&referrer=https%3A%2F%2Fduckduckgo.com%2F&scheme_version=2&stealth.DNT=true&stealth.block_third_party_auth=false&stealth.block_tracker
